        public java.util.ArrayList<Cooccurrence> getCooccurrenceData(java.lang.String type,
                                                             int offset,
                                                             int limit)
        Retrives a chunk of cooccurrence pairs from the database and turns them into Cooccurrence objects.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of cooccurrences specified by the table name
        offset - The number of the start row
        limit - The number of rows to fetch from the database
        Returns:
        A list of Cooccurrence objects

      • getTuples

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.jruby.compiler.ir.Tuple<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>> getTuples(java.lang.String query)
        Runs the query on the database and returns the first two values of each row in the result set as a tuple.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to perform against the database. Must have at least two return values per row
        Returns:
        A list of tuples. One for each row in the result set
